caption.p:
Dynamical regimes for three different models of epidemics with utility benefits. The first row shows the number of infected individuals over time. The second row shows proportion of [ II], [ SI] and [ SS] over time. The third row shows the rate of different rewirings, where for example, ‘I → I to I → S’ indicates the rewiring by an infected individual from an infected to a susceptible. Here
